A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Firstly\, people giving this movie a 1/2 or 1 star are fully retarded as this movie from a review standpoint is evidently better than that.  The plot does work and follows previous star wars traits and it is an exciting movie.  There is no way this movie is of 1/2 or 1 star rating and anyone trying to sabotage the rating of this movie with ridiculously low ratings without real reasoning\, such as an un-followable script\, or laughably bad acting (neither of which is here) shouldn't be allowed to give ratings.
